title: Citibank Bahrain Enhances Security Measures for Online Banking
summary: Manama - With the aim of improving security measures for all customers' online banking transactions, Citibank Bahrain announced implementing 'Dynamic Multi Factor Authentication' on online and mobile banking platforms.
tag-1: Citibank Bahrain Enhances Security Measures for Online Banking
tag-2: Manama – With the aim of improving security measures for all customers' online banking transactions, Citibank Bahrain announced implementing 'Dynamic Multi Factor Authentication' on online and mobile banking platforms.
tag-3: This new security feature comes in the form of One-Time Pins (OTP) through our Internet Banking (Citibank online – CBOL) & Mobile Banking (Citi Mobile) facility. The new One-Time Pin service sends a unique number to customers in the form of a text message to their mobile phones every time they log on to CBOL & Citi Mobile. Clients can perform multiple transactions within each internet session.
tag-4: Mazin Manna, CEO of Citi Bahrain, commented, "Global and local regulatory agencies continue to be increasingly mindful of the evolving threats to online banking. We are pleased to implement this critical initiative in a timely manner, towards adjusting our customer authentication methods, layered security arrangements and other controls to counter any potential risks."
tag-5: Navneet Kampani, Citibank Bahrain Consumer Bank Head, added, "Online environments have become more hostile as fraudsters have continued to develop and deploy more sophisticated, effective and malicious methods to compromise authentication mechanisms and gain unauthorized access to customers' online accounts. This security feature keeps us several steps ahead of such developments and ensures unparalleled security and safety of banking with Citi Bahrain."
tag-6: Citi has been in the Middle East for nearly 50 years and offers consumer-banking services in Bahrain, UAE and Egypt. In the Kingdom of Bahrain alone, Citibank, N.A., being a wholly owned entity of Citi and providing consumer banking services as well, has had a presence for the past 24 years.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
